info.title: Sanchalak Mobile API
info.description: API documentation for Sanchalak Mobile Application (Parent/Student)

tags.name: Authentication
tags.description: Endpoints for user authentication (Email/Password & Mobile OTP)

tags.name: Transport & Tracking
tags.description: Bus route, live location, limits and stops endpoints

post.description: Receives location updates from GPS hardware.
Exchanges a valid refresh token for a new access token and rotated refresh token.

401.description: Invalid refresh token or Reuse attempt detected

post.description: Validates the OTP and returns JWT access/refresh tokens. Used for mobile app login.

400.description: Invalid OTP or User not found

post.description: Generates and sends a 6-digit OTP to the registered mobile number

400.description: User not found or invalid request

429.description: Rate limit exceeded (max 3 attempts per 15 min)

post.description: Revokes the specified refresh token so it cannot be used again.

get.description: Returns ordered list of stops with estimated arrival times based on current bus location.

parameters.name: studentId
parameters.description: ID of the student (Required for PARENT role)

get.description: Returns the transport route, vehicle, and stop assigned to the student. Parents must provide studentId.

parameters.name: studentId
parameters.description: ID of the student (Required for PARENT role)

get.description: Returns the latest GPS ping for the vehicle on the specified route.

parameters.name: studentId
parameters.description: ID of the student (Required for PARENT role)

403.description: User/Student not assigned to this route

get.description: Returns history of boarding/alighting events for the student.

parameters.name: studentId
parameters.description: ID of the student (Required for PARENT role)
